document_data.name: Shadowkiss
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shadowkiss''' was a criminal organization that operated across the [[Dragon Sea (Abeir)|Dragon Sea]]. Their base of operations was the city of [[Lylorn]], in the [[Dusk Ports]] of [[Laerakond]].
document_data.Activities: The Shadowkiss engaged in illegal activities such as drug and poisons selling across Laerakond.
